forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before midnight. Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 8 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 76. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 86. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between midnight and 5am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon

Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
